features: PRACTICAL AND RELIABLE DESIGN - With an ultra-durable metal structure and over a foot of under bed clearance space for storing odds and ends, this metal foundation is an understated solution built for more than just great sleep.Maximum weight recommendation:350 pounds

NO BOX SPRING NEEDED - Durable steel slats support and extend the life of your latex,memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 350 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 700 lbs
EASY ASSEMBLY - Everything you need is efficiently packed into one box and shipped straight to your door; all parts, tools and instructions are included for easy, two-person assembly in under an hour
Worry-free 5-year limited warranty included; mattress sold separately
body.description: The Van steel 16 inch metal platform bed by Zinus provides strong support for your memory foam, latex, or spring mattress. This platform bed is 16 inches high with clearance under the frame for valuable under bed storage. The Zinus Van metal platform bed provides reliable and durable mattress support. Mattress sold separately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storage with style This bed has it all A strong steel frame that never squeaks, plenty of room to store things underneath, and rounded corners so you won’t bang your ankles all in one attractive bed frame that goes with just about any bedroom decor.

A design that's practical & functional Goodbye box spring With strong steel slats spaced evenly apart (7.60” for queen and king and 6.61” for smaller sizes), your mattress will have all the support it needs without a box spring. Maximum storage With 14” of clearance, you’ll be able to fit just about anything underneath.
Choosing the right bed frame Rounded frame Soften up your aesthetic with the rounded edges of our Van metal bed frame. Square frame If right angles are more your style, try the Yelena bed frame.

Compare metal beds Van 16" Yelena 14" Yelena 18" Frame material Steel Frame material Steel Frame material Steel Under bed clearance 14" Under bed clearance 12" Under bed clearance 16.38" Leg shape Rounded Leg shape Square Leg shape Square Headboard compatible No Headboard compatible Yes Headboard compatible Yes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ZINUS Yelena 14 Inch Metal Platform Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: The ZINUS Yelena 14-inch Metal Platform Bed Frame is a well-regarded choice for those in need of a sturdy and convenient bed frame. Here's a brief overview:The 14-inch height provides ample space underneath the bed, allowing for storage or simply creating an open and airy feel in the room. This feature adds versatility to the bed frame, catering to various preferences and needs.The metal construction ensures durability and stability, providing a reliable foundation for the mattress. The steel slat support system is designed to eliminate the need for a box spring, streamlining the setup process and potentially reducing additional costs.The "No Box Spring Needed" design not only simplifies assembly but also contributes to a sleek and modern aesthetic. This makes the bed frame suitable for various bedroom styles and preferences.Easy assembly is a key feature of the ZINUS Yelena bed frame. The straightforward construction and clear instructions make the assembly process accessible, even for those with limited DIY experience.In conclusion, the ZINUS Yelena 14-inch Metal Platform Bed Frame offers a practical and stylish solution for those in search of a durable and easy-to-assemble bed frame. Its design eliminates the need for a box spring, making it a cost-effective and modern choice for a variety of bedroom setups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my 14-inch metal platform bed frame! It's a fantastic addition to my bedroom. The sturdy construction gives me complete peace of mind, knowing that it will support me and my mattress without any worries. Assembly was a breeze, taking just a few minutes to set up, thanks to the clear instructions provided.The 14-inch height provides excellent under-bed storage space, which is a huge plus for someone like me with limited room in my apartment. It's perfect for keeping extra bedding, shoes, or seasonal items neatly tucked away.The metal frame's design is sleek and modern, adding a touch of elegance to my bedroom decor. Despite its minimalist appearance, it feels remarkably solid and durable. The noise-free experience ensures a peaceful night's sleep, and I wake up feeling well-rested and ready to take on the day.Overall, I couldn't be happier with my 14-inch metal platform bed frame. It's the ideal blend of functionality, style, and affordability. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and chic bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Stylish, and No Box Spring Required – A Vacation Rental Essential!
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased several ZINUS Van 16 Inch Metal Platform Bed Frames in different sizes, and they have proven to be a game-changer for our vacation rentals. The fact that you don't need a box spring is a major convenience, and the ease of assembly makes them an absolute winner.These bed frames are not only functional but also stylish, adding a modern touch to any bedroom. The steel slat support ensures stability, and I appreciate the durability that comes with the ZINUS brand.If you're looking for a hassle-free, sturdy, and aesthetically pleasing bed frame for your vacation rental properties, the ZINUS Van 16 Inch Metal Platform Bed Frame is the way to go. It's become our go-to choice for all our beds, and the positive feedback from guests speaks volumes about their comfort and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good, with one caveat...
reviews.reviewText: Since my bed is traditionally at floor level, I bought this bed frame to be ready for the recovery period for upcoming foot surgery. Finally built the bed, had the surgery and am currently using it for about 6 weeks.The Good: If you can turn a wrench, it goes together fast and easily. It's solid once built. i'm about 170 pounds and there's no wavering or wobbling when I'm on it.The not so good: About 2 weeks into using it each night (and much of the day), it acquired a few small creaking noises. Now, 6 weeks in, it's got more creaks and moans. I predict the downfall of this bed frame is that after a year, it'll sound like Grampa's old farm truck, a-groanin' and a squeakin' and a creakin' every time you move on it. We'll see. The parts go together very snugly, so I'm not sure what could be done during assembly to counteract the tendency to creak. There's no room to put plastic slipsheets or suchlike between the parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2nd purchase in 6 years!! Highly recommend!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved and needed to buy another queen bed frame. I flocked to ZINUS without hesitation! I set up a frame about six years ago at my mother's residence in the same exact design- Yelena 14"- due to it not making a single noise for the six years of use!! Back then, I spent hours going through reviews of other manufacturers/companies design issues, squeaks, missing parts and lengthy assembly times. When I ordered the original frame, the setup took less than an hour and I've not even needed to tighten a single bolt using it!This time around, the price had increased and I was on a budget, so I did shop around again but this time the other frame reviews seemed worse than back then! While ZINUS's price on this frame has gone up a bit, I ordered it. The framing is now just as sturdy but with a slightly slender bar design and somewhat rounded frame corners. If you're like me, I catch my shin on the corners every now and again, so this perk made me very happy!! I love their anti-slip adhesive strips, the only issue I've ever had with the mattress was the sheet coming off, never the mattress moving which is a sigh of relief when you have no headboard or footboard!The assembly comes neatly labeled and still takes about an hour with one person. They provide both an allen wrench and a socket wrench with an allen wrench attachment built in to make it even easier, with two people it would probably take 30 minutes!The bolts all come neatly organized in a package,labelled by letter and the instructions are easy to read.I cannot recommend this frame enough if you want sleek, sturdy and no headache!!
Viene con su herramienta de armado y sus instrucciones muy claras. en 30 minutos ya la tenía puesta. Cuando me acuesto no hace ruido y es resistente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy, and a very reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: This product came shipped in a heavy but manageable box, delivered right to my door. It is visually very sleek, lovely powder coated steel pieces, in a matte black, smooth, modern finish. It was mostly easy to put together, it came with an Allen wrench which I never used, and a mini rachet wrench that was very convenient. Whomever designed the printed instructions is a sadist. I looked at the pictograms and ran with that. if you try to follow the alpha numeric instructions they have included, I hope you have your local asylum on speed dial. When complete, it is solid and lightweight, easy to move around, even with a mattress. It is very high with a mattress only, I don’t recommend also using a box spring, it would end up higher than your hip. The high clearance underneath, which was the deal clincher for choosing this model for me, is excellent. You can easily fit standard sterility lidded storage boxes and many other things underneath. Very important if you are an apartment dweller like me, and have limited space, and zero storage space. Overall, this product met, and in many ways exceeded my expectations.

Esta base de cama está muy bien, buen diseño, ligera y resistente para lo que fue diseñada, fácil de armar y desarmar sólo se ocupa una llave y el manual que vienen incluidos.Se nota frágil, si embargo ya armada y trabajando en conjunto todas sus parte, es aceptable.Además me llegó con un super regalo: Bate de béisbol, detalle que se agradece.
Exelente producto me gustó mucho lo volvería a comprar

The instructions were perfectly clear and simple. Half hour max with 2 people. The best is the support it gives to our new Zinus mattress. Haven't slept this well in comfort for quite a few years. Love it.
